title: Prismacolor Premier Pencil Sharpener,Black
description: Ensure your Prismacolor pencils are always sharp and ready to draw with the Prismacolor Premier Pencil Sharpener. Featuring two different blades, one for a fine point, the other for a wide point, you’ll always have the right level of sharpness for your art projects. The blades of your Prismacolor pencil sharpener are made of premium steel while the black body is translucent, making it easy to see when it’s time to empty it.
